title: Tongue Twister Training
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>You want to try tongue twisters….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah. I was thinking that it would be nice if I could speak like Nico-chan. You do that kind of training in the theaters club, right, Shizuku-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I see, I understand. Then, let’s start with the easiest one. Repeat after me, okay? Here we go…. “Tonari no Kyaku wa Yoku Kaki Kuu Kyaku Da”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Tonari nyo kyaku a yoku kyaki…. Ki....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>S-, sorry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Aaah, it’s my fault! I’m sorry, I’m truly sorry! I can’t even say the easiest one~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>If you practice enough, you’ll surely be able to say it, so cheer up! There are other easy ones! Here we go, “Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago! Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago! Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago! Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago! I can say it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waah, amazing! You did great, Hanayo-chan, you can do this! Then let’s do the next one, “Aka Maki Gami Ao Maki Gami Ki Maki Gami”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Aka Maki Gya…. Ao…. Ao Makya…. U, uu. Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago! Nama Mugi Nama Gome Nama Tamago!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Don’t tell me…. you can only say the ones…. that are related to rice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
